text: (Napiye!) Avarkalutaiya celvattiliruntu tarmattirkanatai etuttuk kontu, atanal avarkalai ullum puramum tuymaiyakkuviraka, innum avarkalukkakap pirarttanai ceyviraka niccayamaka um'mutaiya pirarttanai avarkalukku (cantiyum), arutalum alikkum; allah (yavarraiyum) ceviyuruvonakavum, aripavanakavum irukkinran
